title: MAGLYNX: On Its Way to Excel as an Effortless and All-in-One 'Wireless' Charger
description: Offering the sleekest wire-free MagSafe wireless charger, founder David Lerner puts away the clutter and welcomes wireless freedom.
content:
It is always surreal to learn about brands and businesses that choose the less-trodden paths, not to show off that they stand different, but because they truly stand on a solid foundation of uniqueness and authenticity. These brands and companies are committed to a path that leads them toward making a significant shift in their industry, inspiring the next generation to believe in their wildest dreams while being driven by a powerful purpose to fulfil, much like David Lerner. This incredible founder and innovator is the mind and heart behind .

What is MAGLYNX? Well, it is a one-of-a-kind, sleek, compact device that plugs directly into the wall, eliminating clutter, balancing perfectly mid-air, without the need for bricks or stands. When David Lerner says and he means that. MAGLYNX's sleekest wire-free MagSafe wireless charger is all that and more, helping people put away the clutter and welcome wireless freedom like never before.

With MAGLYNX, Lerner has stepped into a cluttered space to cut the and offer innovativeness in wireless charging. The product is a magnetic wall-mounted charger that delivers what it promises, which is true wireless freedom, with no trays, stands, wires, and the like. By not focusing on the rat race out there in the tech world, he instead focused on removing everything unnecessary by subtraction and not addition. He emphasises how wireless shouldn't mean wires; it should mean one can easily walk away from clutter entirely. This very philosophy today has made him the head honcho of MAGLYNX, offering a MagSafe wireless charger that easily plugs directly into a wall outlet.

With a satisfying magnetic snap, it holds an iPhone or AirPods securely mid-air, helping it transform the wall itself into a charging dock. The minimalism the team has adopted for making this device seamlessly blend into any space has helped eliminate the need to clean around cords or rearrange furniture to fit a charging station. David Lerner points out that most wireless chargers simply conceal wires, but MAGLYNX stands apart because it totally discards them. The standard model plugs directly into any wall outlet with magnetic precision. The upgraded version adds support for Apple Watch charging and a discreet USB-C port for tablets, headphones, and other devices, all while preserving the clean, wall-mounted look.

The patent-pending design of the device is certified Apple MagSafe, built with aerospace-grade materials, and equipped with powerful N52 magnets for a secure hold. Retractable prongs make it pocket-friendly, while an efficient internal layout prevents overheating. This results in a pocket-sized, travel-ready charger that works just as beautifully in a living room as it does in an airport lounge.

Launched on August 15, the product has already garnered much attention, as over 16,000 early depositors have put their trust in the device, and 15,000 have signed up for updates. From heat management to plug alignment, each detail was refined to create a charger that works effortlessly and invisibly in the background. Pre-order of the product is only $1, making the shift accessible for everyone.

Founder David Lerner is a product innovator and entrepreneur with a track record of over $250,000 in online sales. The success he has achieved in the business world is rooted in his focus on quality, fast shipping, and obsessive customer care. These values have not only stayed close to him but have also propelled him forward in the industries he has chosen to be in. As the man behind MAGLYNX, a patent-pending wireless charger designed to simplify charging for iPhone and AirPods users, he has brought about a new wave in the tech world.
summary: David Lerner, founder and entrepreneur of MAGLYNX, has created a revolutionary wireless charger that eliminates clutter and allows for true wireless charging without the need for trays, stands, wires. The compact device plugs directly into the wall and holds an iPhone or AirPods securely mid-air, without needing bricks or stands. The MagSafe wireless charger is certified Apple MagSafe and comes with a discreet USB-C port for tablets, headphones, and other devices. The product has been pre-ordered for $1 and has already attracted over 16,000 early depositors and 15,000 updates.
shortSummary: The sleek, compact MagSafe wireless charger, designed by David Lerner to simplify and enhance wireless charging, delivers true wireless freedom without wires, integrating seamlessly into any space.
